name: Geometric Neon
description:
When you hit an enemy, you only die if you and the enemy are different shape and colors. if you and the enemy are the same shape and color, the enemy will leave you alone and... sorta, commit suicide??

Controls:

Arrow keys -> move

1 Key -> switch to an orange square

2 Key -> switch to a yellow triangle

3 Key -> switch to a red circle

X -> Release A BOMB and M**DER all enemies in a circle around the player

Pickups:

Bomb -> get one more bomb to your inventory

Paint Bucket -> make all current enemies switch to your current color

Star -> FREAKING K*LL all current enemies

A game by Avatar Games team:

André Stern -> music

Jules Andrault -> graphics

Antonin Stern -> programming and sound effects

Enjoy :)
